```{r}
ggplot(kpg_sf) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = mukim), col = "gray50") +
  geom_sf(data = mkm_sf, col = "black", lwd = 0.5, fill = NA) +
  geom_sf(data = filter(kpg_sf, is.na(mukim)), fill = "gray70", col = "gray70") +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "turbo") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
